name: Teleren Candy Rush
description:
Run along the street in 2D top down platform adventure. Runwith Teleren in this new game addition to the new candy rush series.

This is an endless running game where the player controls the game character, Teleren, an energetic young girl, to dogde cars,beat the boss,  and keep the energy bar filled up by collecting spilled candy on the road side. It is the first installment to the candy rush series which will contain new and upgraded games on the future.

A sequel titled Teleren Candy Rush 2 will be posted in mid May, but feel free to tell us what you think about this first installment, and don't forget to donate an amount for us at Wavy to start properly, we would really appreciate it.
